languages.text: "Я все еще остаюсь частью твоей свиты, {name} — это не изменилось. Я продолжу сопровождать тебя, пока не получу иной приказ от Лорд-инквизитора... если получу". {n}Хейнрикс мрачнеет.{/n} "Кто знает — возможно, когда-нибудь я закончу свой путь так же, как Эмелина. Но этот день еще не настал".

traits.locale_text: "Я все еще остаюсь частью твоей свиты, {name} — это не изменилось. Я продолжу сопровождать тебя, пока не получу иной приказ от Лорд-Инквизитора... если получу". {n}Хейнрикс мрачнеет.{/n} "Кто знает — возможно, когда-нибудь я закончу свой путь так же, как Эмилина. Но этот день еще не настал".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "I will remain part of your retinue, {name} — that will not change. I will continue to accompany you until I receive orders to the contrary from the Lord Inquisitor... if ever." {n}Heinrix's face darkens.{/n} "Who knows? Perhaps one day my journey will end like Emelina's. But that day is not today."
languages.original_text: "Я все еще остаюсь частью твоей свиты, {name} — это не изменилось. Я продолжу сопровождать тебя, пока не получу иной приказ от Лорд-инквизитора... если получу". {n}Хейнрикс мрачнеет.{/n} "Кто знает — возможно, когда-нибудь я закончу свой путь так же, как Эмелина. Но этот день еще не настал".

traits.locale_text: "I will remain part of your retinue, {name} — that will not change. I will continue to accompany you until I receive orders to the contrary from the Lord Inquisitor... if ever." {n}Heinrix's face darkens.{/n} "Who knows? Perhaps one day my journey will end like Emelina's. But that day is not today."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Seguiré formando parte de tu séquito, {name}; eso no va a cambiar. Te acompañaré hasta que el lord Inquisidor me ordene lo contrario... si es que llega a hacerlo». {n}El rostro de Heinrix se ensombrece.{/n} «¿Quién sabe? Tal vez mi viaje termine algún día, igual que el de Emelina. Pero no será hoy».
languages.original_text: "I will remain part of your retinue, {name} — that will not change. I will continue to accompany you until I receive orders to the contrary from the Lord Inquisitor... if ever." {n}Heinrix's face darkens.{/n} "Who knows? Perhaps one day my journey will end like Emelina's. But that day is not today."

traits.locale_text: «Seguiré formando parte de tu séquito, {name}; eso no va a cambiar. Te acompañaré hasta que el lord Inquisidor me ordene lo contrario... si es que llega a hacerlo». {n}El rostro de Heinrix se ensombrece.{/n} «¿Quién sabe? Tal vez mi viaje termine algún día, igual que el de Emelina. Pero no será hoy».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの従者として行動を共にする、{name}…それは変わらない。ロード・インクィジターより任務終了の命令を受けるまで、俺はあなた方に同行し続ける…もしそうなればの話だが」{n}ハインリックスの表情が暗くなる。{/n}「いつか俺もエメリナと同じ目に遭うかもしれない。だが、それは先の話だ」
languages.original_text: "I will remain part of your retinue, {name} — that will not change. I will continue to accompany you until I receive orders to the contrary from the Lord Inquisitor... if ever." {n}Heinrix's face darkens.{/n} "Who knows? Perhaps one day my journey will end like Emelina's. But that day is not today."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの従者として行動を共にする、{name}…それは変わらない。ロード・インクィジターより任務終了の命令を受けるまで、俺はあなた方に同行し続ける…もしそうなればの話だが」{n}ハインリックスの表情が暗くなる。{/n}「いつか俺もエメリナと同じ目に遭うかもしれない。だが、それは先の話だ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我会继续留在你身边，{name}，这一点不会改变。我会继续陪伴你，直到大审判官命令我离开为止……如果他会这么做的话。”{n}海因里希的脸阴沉下来。{/n}“谁知道呢？或许某一天，我的旅程也会像艾米莉娜那样结束，但并非此时此刻。”
languages.original_text: "I will remain part of your retinue, {name} — that will not change. I will continue to accompany you until I receive orders to the contrary from the Lord Inquisitor... if ever." {n}Heinrix's face darkens.{/n} "Who knows? Perhaps one day my journey will end like Emelina's. But that day is not today."

traits.locale_text: “我会继续留在你身边，{name}，这一点不会改变。我会继续陪伴你，直到审判长命令我离开为止……如果他会这么做的话。”{n}海因里希的脸阴沉下来。{/n}“谁知道呢？或许某一天，我的旅程也会像艾米莉娜那样结束，但并非此时此刻。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je resterai dans votre entourage, {name} ; il n'y aura aucun changement de ce côté-là. Je continuerai à vous accompagner jusqu'à ce que je reçoive un ordre contraire du seigneur inquisiteur... pour peu que cela se produise un jour, {n}déclare Heinrix, puis son visage s'assombrit.{/n} Qui sait ? Peut-être finirai-je un jour comme Emelina, mais pas aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "I will remain part of your retinue, {name} — that will not change. I will continue to accompany you until I receive orders to the contrary from the Lord Inquisitor... if ever." {n}Heinrix's face darkens.{/n} "Who knows? Perhaps one day my journey will end like Emelina's. But that day is not today."

traits.locale_text: « Je resterai dans votre entourage, {name} ; il n'y aura aucun changement de ce côté-là. Je continuerai à vous accompagner jusqu'à ce que je reçoive un ordre contraire du seigneur inquisiteur... pour peu que cela se produise un jour, {n}déclare Heinrix, puis son visage s'assombrit.{/n} Qui sait ? Peut-être finirai-je un jour comme Emelina, mais pas aujourd'hui. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bleibe Teil Eures Gefolges, {name}, das ändert sich nicht. Ich begleite Euch weiter, bis ich vom Großinquisitor anderweitige Befehle erhalte ... falls das je geschieht." {n}Heinrix' Miene verdüstert sich.{/n} "Wer weiß? Vielleicht endet meine Reise eines Tages wie Emelinas. Doch nicht heute."
languages.original_text: "I will remain part of your retinue, {name} — that will not change. I will continue to accompany you until I receive orders to the contrary from the Lord Inquisitor... if ever." {n}Heinrix's face darkens.{/n} "Who knows? Perhaps one day my journey will end like Emelina's. But that day is not today."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bleibe Teil Eures Gefolges, {name}, das ändert sich nicht. Ich begleite Euch weiter, bis ich vom Großinquisitor anderweitige Befehle erhalte ... falls das je geschieht." {n}Heinrix' Miene verdüstert sich.{/n} "Wer weiß? Vielleicht endet meine Reise eines Tages wie Emelinas. Doch nicht heute."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I will remain part of your retinue,  — that will not change. I will continue to accompany you until I receive orders to the contrary from the Lord Inquisitor... if ever." {n}Heinrix's face darkens.{/n} "Who knows? Perhaps one day my journey will end like Emelina's. But that day is not today."

languages.text: "Maiyetinde kalacağım {name}... Orası değişmeyecek. Lord Engizisyoncu aksini emredene dek yanında olmayı sürdüreceğim. Belki de..." {n}Heinrix'in yüzü kararıyor.{/n} "Kim bilir... Belki benim de sonum, Emelina gibi olur. Ancak o gün henüz gelmedi."
languages.original_text: "I will remain part of your retinue, {name} — that will not change. I will continue to accompany you until I receive orders to the contrary from the Lord Inquisitor... if ever." {n}Heinrix's face darkens.{/n} "Who knows? Perhaps one day my journey will end like Emelina's. But that day is not today."

traits.locale_text: "Maiyetinde kalacağım {name}... Orası değişmeyecek. Lord Engizisyoncu aksini emredene dek yanında olmayı sürdüreceğim. Belki de..." {n}Heinrix'in yüzü kararıyor.{/n} "Kim bilir? Belki benim de sonum Emelina gibi olur. Ancak o gün henüz gelmedi."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
